label: Distributed Systems
description: Protocols, specification techniques, global states and their determination, reliable broadcast, transactions and commitment, security, and real-time systems. Same as ECE 428. 3 undergraduate hours. 3 or 4 graduate hours. Prerequisite: CS 241 or ECE 391.
courseSectionInformation: Same as ECE 428. 3 undergraduate hours. 3 or 4 graduate hours. Prerequisite: CS 241 or ECE 391.
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to Computer Science or Statistics & Computer Science or Math & Computer Science or Computer Sci & Anthropology or Computer Sci & Astronomy or Computer Sci & Chemistry or Computer Sci & Linguistics major(s). Restricted to students with Senior or Graduate class standing.
